original: @344b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @344b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sv'a ra sva t'i sto tra n'a ma /
analyzed: sv'a ra sva t'i sto tra n'a ma /
translated: Svarasvatostotra-nama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: lha mo dbyangs can gyi bstod pa /
analyzed: lha mo dbyangs can gyi bstod pa /
translated: Praise of Goddess Sarasvatƒ´

original: ston zla rab rgyas ku mud dung dang chu shel gangs ri ltar dkar ba //
analyzed: ston zla rab rgyas ku mud dung dang chu shel gangs ri ltar dkar ba //
translated: White like the autumn full moon, the white water lily, the conch, the crystal, or the snow mountains,

original: rab dkar dkar gsal gzi ldan yid 'phrog lha mo dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: rab dkar dkar gsal gzi ldan yid 'phrog lha mo dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to the goddess Sarasvatƒ´, who is very white, radiant white, brilliant, and captivating.üîΩDestroy the entire mass of ignorance, confusion, and delusion in my mind,

original: bdag blo'i mi shes gti mug rmongs pa'i tshogs ni kun nas 'joms pa dang // smra ngan sun 'byin thogs med kun gzigs spobs pa'i gter mchog rgyas par mdzod //
analyzed: bdag blo'i mi shes gti mug rmongs pa'i tshogs ni kun nas 'joms pa dang // smra ngan sun 'byin thogs med kun gzigs spobs pa'i gter mchog rgyas par mdzod //
translated: And expand the supreme treasury of eloquence, the all-seeing one who refutes evil speech without obstruction.

original: sgrib gnyis sprin bral blo gros 'od zer stong ldan rab tu 'char ka yi //
analyzed: sgrib gnyis sprin bral blo gros 'od zer stong ldan rab tu 'char ka yi //
translated: With the light of a thousand rays of intelligence free from the clouds of the two obscurations,

original: nyi ma'i zer gyis gdul bya'i padmo rab dul kha 'byed rnam rgyas pas //
analyzed: nyi ma'i zer gyis gdul bya'i padmo rab dul kha 'byed rnam rgyas pas //
translated: The sun of the guru rises, causing the lotuses of disciples to fully open, well-tamed, and bloom.

original: rab tu dri zhim bsil ngad dang ldan padmo'i ze'u 'bru'i ngos dag la //
analyzed: rab tu dri zhim bsil ngad dang ldan padmo'i ze'u 'bru'i ngos dag la //
translated: On the petals of the lotus, which are very fragrant and cool,

original: bdag blos gus pas 'thungs pas blo gros cher rgyas sbrang rtsis 'gro rnams skyong //
analyzed: bdag blos gus pas 'thungs pas blo gros cher rgyas sbrang rtsis 'gro rnams skyong //
translated: I drink with respect with my mind, and with the honey of greatly expanded intelligence, I care for beings.

original: gser gyi ri dang kun mkhyen chu gter lta bur kun nas lhun chags pa //
analyzed: gser gyi ri dang kun mkhyen chu gter lta bur kun nas lhun chags pa //
translated: You are majestic like a mountain of gold or an ocean of omniscience,

original: rtsod pa'i phye ma leb dang / bdud sde dus kyi rlung gis bskyod ma yin //
analyzed: rtsod pa'i phye ma leb dang / bdud sde dus kyi rlung gis bskyod ma yin //
translated: Unmoved by the butterflies of debate or the winds of the demon hordes.

original: bcu drug na tshod lta bu'i bu mo rab mdzes sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan //
analyzed: bcu drug na tshod lta bu'i bu mo rab mdzes sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan //
translated: You are a beautiful young woman of sixteen years, with the grace of a dancing goddess,

original: lha yi rgyan rnams du mas khyod kyi lus dang yan lag mdzes pa yis //
analyzed: lha yi rgyan rnams du mas khyod kyi lus dang yan lag mdzes pa yis //
translated: Your body and limbs adorned with many divine ornaments.

original: chu gter 'gram gnas mgrin sngon dga' bskyed rgya mtsho'i lha mo dbyangs @345a * //
analyzed: chu gter 'gram gnas mgrin sngon dga' bskyed rgya mtsho'i lha mo dbyangs @345a * //
translated: You are the goddess Sarasvatƒ´, delighting the blue-throated one who dwells on the shores of the ocean,

original: can ma // khyod la phyag 'tshal brtse bas bdag blo'i mi shes mun pa myur du gsol //
analyzed: can ma // khyod la phyag 'tshal brtse bas bdag blo'i mi shes mun pa myur du gsol //
translated: I pay homage to you. With your compassion, quickly dispel the darkness of ignorance in my mind.

original: rab tu snyan pa'i dbyangs ldan dri za'i bu mo rab mdzes yid 'phrog ma //
analyzed: rab tu snyan pa'i dbyangs ldan dri za'i bu mo rab mdzes yid 'phrog ma //
translated: You are a beautiful and captivating celestial maiden, with a voice as sweet as the gandharva maidens.

original: lag gi 'du byed rab tu bsgyur bas tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs rnam 'byung bas //
analyzed: lag gi 'du byed rab tu bsgyur bas tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs rnam 'byung bas //
translated: By the movement of your hands, the melodious voice of BrahmƒÅ arises.

original: sgra dang tshad ma snyan dngags mngon brjod sdeb sbyor legs bshad chos rnams kun //
analyzed: sgra dang tshad ma snyan dngags mngon brjod sdeb sbyor legs bshad chos rnams kun //
translated: All the teachings of grammar, logic, poetry, lexicography, prosody, and exegesis

original: pha rol yid 'phrog 'dzin par nus pa ci phyir bdag la mi stsol lags //
analyzed: pha rol yid 'phrog 'dzin par nus pa ci phyir bdag la mi stsol lags //
translated: Why do you not grant me the power to captivate the minds of others?

original: khyod kyi thugs ni kun du mi g-yo rgya mtsho chen po lta bu ste //
analyzed: khyod kyi thugs ni kun du mi g-yo rgya mtsho chen po lta bu ste //
translated: Your mind is utterly unmoving, like the great ocean,

original: thugs rje'i rlabs shugs drag tu bskyed pas 'gro ba'i gdung ba rab tu sol //
analyzed: thugs rje'i rlabs shugs drag tu bskyed pas 'gro ba'i gdung ba rab tu sol //
translated: And by generating the powerful waves of compassion, you completely dispel the torment of beings.

original: dbang gi rgyal po'i 'byung gnas yid bzhin re skong dbyangs can rgya mtsho yis //
analyzed: dbang gi rgyal po'i 'byung gnas yid bzhin re skong dbyangs can rgya mtsho yis //
translated: The wish-fulfilling ocean of Sarasvatƒ´, the source of the king of powers,üîΩSwiftly protects the beings tormented by the heat of delusion,

original: rmongs pa'i gdung bas gdungs pa'i skye bo rings par skyong ba dang // gti mug dag gis blo dman skye bo'i re ba myur du skongs //
analyzed: rmongs pa'i gdung bas gdungs pa'i skye bo rings par skyong ba dang // gti mug dag gis blo dman skye bo'i re ba myur du skongs //
translated: And quickly fulfills the hopes of those whose minds are weak due to ignorance.

original: bdag blo'i ku mu da ni rab du kha zums rnam par gnag pa la //üîΩbsil zer byed pa rab tu sprin bral dkyil 'khor rnam par rgyas pa yis //
analyzed: bdag blo'i ku mu da ni rab du kha zums rnam par gnag pa la // bsil zer byed pa rab tu sprin bral dkyil 'khor rnam par rgyas pa yis //
translated: My mind's water lily is completely closed and dark,üîΩBut the moon of your mind, completely free from clouds, with its full orb,

original: ku mud kha bye rab rgyas ze'u 'bru yi bsil dngar rnam par spel bar mdzod //
analyzed: ku mud kha bye rab rgyas ze'u 'bru yi bsil dngar rnam par spel bar mdzod //
translated: Spreads the cool nectar of the pollen-filled anthers of the blooming water lily.

original: rab tu dri bral rkyen gyi dri mas ma phog ma 'gags khyod kyi sku //
analyzed: rab tu dri bral rkyen gyi dri mas ma phog ma 'gags khyod kyi sku //
translated: Your body, completely free from stains, untouched and unobstructed by the stains of conditions,

original: kun du tshangs pa'i dbyangs can ca co'i dri bral khyod kyi gsung //
analyzed: kun du tshangs pa'i dbyangs can ca co'i dri bral khyod kyi gsung //
translated: Your speech is the voice of Brahma, free from the taint of cacophony.

original: shes bya kun la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan khyod kyi thugs //
analyzed: shes bya kun la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan khyod kyi thugs //
translated: Your mind is endowed with the wisdom that is unobstructed with regard to all objects of knowledge.

original: bstod pa 'di yis bstod la dbyangs can ma yis blo gros mchog rab stsol //
analyzed: bstod pa 'di yis bstod la dbyangs can ma yis blo gros mchog rab stsol //
translated: May Sarasvatƒ´ grant supreme intelligence to one who praises you with this praise.

original: dbyangs can gyi bstod pa 'di ni /
analyzed: dbyangs can gyi bstod pa 'di ni /
translated: This praise of Sarasvatƒ´

original: lho phyogs kyi rgyud du byung ba'i mkhas pa chen po pandi ta nag mo'i khol gyis dbyangs can zhal gzigs pa'i dus su dgyes te bstod pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: lho phyogs kyi rgyud du byung ba'i mkhas pa chen po pandi ta nag mo'i khol gyis dbyangs can zhal gzigs pa'i dus su dgyes te bstod pa rdzogs so /
translated: was composed by the great scholar of the southern region, the pa·πá·∏çita K·πõ·π£·πáapa·πá·∏çita, when he was delighted upon having a vision of Sarasvatƒ´. It is complete.

analyzed: // / gang zhig 'di 'don pa la shes rab stsol bar khas blangs so ;
translated: She promised to grant supreme intelligence to one who recites this.

analyzed: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po panti ta dzny'a na sh'i la dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o /
